The Spirit of Prayer Will Actuate Every 
                     Believer 


     "When this reformation begins, the spirit of prayer will actuate every believer, and will banish from the church the spirit 
                                                                           18
of discord and strife. Those who have not been living in Christian fellowship will draw close to one another. . . . The barriers separating believer from believer will be broken down, and God's servants will speak the same things."--Id., page 251.
